Our Sugar Whipped Soap is a convenient scrub and soap in one! Fine sugar gently polishes and softens skin, with tons of bubbly lather! Gentle enough for every day use!

SLS, Phthalate, Paraben & Propylene Glycol Free!

You will get one 10 oz/283g jar labeled with directions and ingredients! Please recycle!

Directions: Scoop out about a tablespoon of Sugar Whipped soap and apply to wet skin. Rinse with warm water. Apply more as necessary to wash entire body.

Great with a bath sponge for maximum lather.

Avoid eye area and sensitive or broken skin.

name: Pumpkin Pie Limited Edition Whipped Cream - shea butter body cream
description:
95% natural shea butter body cream in our warm delicious pumpkin pie scent! 4 oz jar.
Scented like cinnamon, and butter crust with sweet pumpkin swirl.

Our Whipped Creams are a super moisturizing whipped body cream with a lightweight, non greasy feel! The fluffy soft texture is easily speadable and little goes a long way. The formula sinks into your skin keeping you soft all day! You can even feel it working after washing your hands!
Here are a few of the REALLY amazing ingredients:

Raw Shea butter – Minimally processed sustainably sourced shea butter. One of the best moisturizing, anti-aging, regenerating and hydrating natural butters!

Sunflower Seed Oil – High is vitamin E, a crucial vitamin in the prevention of damage to sensitive skin cells by ultraviolet light from the sun. Studies have shown that vitamin E may prevent scarring, smooth the appearance of existing wrinkles and generally improve the appearance and health of your skin.

Hydrolized Oat Protein – derived from oats this ingredient actually retains moisture in low humidity so it actually helps draw moisture to your skin!

Ingredients: Aqua, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower*) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter*) Fruit, Emulsifying Wax, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond*) Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Proprietary Fragrance and Essential Oil Blend, Hydrolized Oat Protein, Phenoxyethanol (and) Caprylyl Glycol.
Paraben Free! * Organic Ingredient. Gluten Free

name: Try Me First "MINI" Sugar Whipped Soaps
description:
These new 2 oz Mini sizes are great for sampling a new scent and make sweet little gifts or party favors!

Our Sugar Whipped Soap is a convenient scrub and soap in one! Fine sugar gently polishes and softens skin, with tons of bubbly lather! Gentle enough for every day use! Filled with skin loving moisturizers and gentle enough for every day use!

Choose from these scents:

Bamboo Sugarcane: A sparkling splash of citrus and sweet florals of jasmine and rose, join branches of green leaves with a dry down of pure sugar sweetness. (VERY ZEN!!!)

Cardamom Vanilla: BEST SELLER - Creamy, saturated with sugar and scented with Warm buttery vanilla custard and fresh ground spicy green cardamom!

Chocolate Coconut: Rich silky dark chocolate topped with toasted slivers of candied coconut!

Beach House: BEST SELLER - Bright and citrus fresh, with black currant, lime, Italian Lemon, and florals. A Fresh clean linen scent. for the LADIES and MEN.

Lemon Poppyseed - Yeah, just like the muffins! Mouth watering Lemon butter cake drizzled with buttercreme icing! Real Poppy seed dot the soap adding extra exfoliation!

Orange Sherbet: NEW - Cold and tangy orange sherbet filled with vanilla bean ice cream - just like an orange creamsicle!

Punch Drunk: GREAT FOR SUMMER! A blend of Passionfruit, Pineapple, Guava and a little Aloha. Perfectly tropical and will make you wish for the Islands!

Raspberry Bellini: Luscious tart raspberry, black currant a touch of bubbly champagne mingle into a perfect juicy sweet scent!

Vanilla Fig: Sweet vanilla musk with ripe fig, candied rum and dark amber. A sophisticated scent, not too sweet and very feminine!

Base Ingredients: Ingredients: Sucrose (sugar), Distilled Water, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (from Coconut oil, sodium isethionate helps water cling to the dirt and oil on your skin, allowing it to be washed away. Because of sodium isethionate's mild nature, it's often found in toothpastes and in baby soaps), Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate (foaming agent, cleanser, skin conditioner, high biodegradability!), Sodium Chloride (salt), Phenoxyethanol (preservative), Tetrasodium EDTA (preservative), Fragrance, D&C Red no 33.

Our sugar whipped soap is bubbly, scrubby, skin softening with a minimal environmental impact!
Always SLS, Paraben and Phalate free

name: Lavender Chamomile Calming Bath Tea
description:
Let the scent of Lavender and Chamomile sooth your mind and sore muscles. This bath tea combines a blend of Organic Herbs and essential oils to create a fragrant bath water. Added Gluten Free Oatmeal softens your skin, is soothing and relieves dryness.

each pack contains 3 bath teas.

Directions: Place one bath tea bag in the tubwhile running  warm water. The tea willsteep as the tub fills. Leave the bath tea in thetub while you relax in the water. Remove and discard after one use. 

Ingredients: Avena Sativa (Organic Gluten Free Oat) Kernel Meal, Lavandula Angustifolia (Organic Lavender) Flower, Matricaria Recutita (Organic Chamomile) Flower, Melissa Officinalis (Organic Lemon Balm) Leaf,  Rubus Idaeus (Organic Red Raspberry) Leaf, Lavandula Angustifolia (Organic Lavender)Flower Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Matricaria Recutita (Chamomile) Oil.

name: Menthol Salve with Peppermint, Rosemary and Lavender
description:
This Natural Menthol salve combines essential oils known to help with tired sore muscles, with the penetrating power of menthol. Unlike may commercial salves, we do not use any petroleum ingredients in our salve, only natural oils from plants and beeswax. 

Apply directly to skin anywhere you're sore like on shoulders, knees, elbows, and back. You will feel it start to work in 10 minutes, though you may feel it immediately. It also works great on the chest area to help with congestion. Re-apply as needed.

Caution: please avoid contact with eyes, nose, mouth, and other sensitive areas. Note that if you use the product after a shower or exercise, when your pores are open it will magnify the sensation of the menthol so use caution under those circumstances.

85% ORGANIC INGREDIENTS ~ PALM OIL FREE ~ 100% NATURAL

Ingredients: Organic Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Organic Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil, Beeswax, Menthol, Organic Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Juniperus Communis (Juniper) Fruit Oil.  

net. wt. 2.25 oz/61g.

name: Coconut Rose Salve
description:
This fragrant salve is perfect for fighting dry skin and contains vitamin rich oils such as Coconut, Argan and Meadowfoam. With Precious Rose Absolute and Virgin Coconut oil for a light floral Coconut Scent.
Did you know it takes 60,000 roses to make just one ounce of rose absolute? That's about 180 lbs!

Great for the whole body after the shower or just really dry spots like knees and elbows! Great for lips, dry cuticles and to tame fly-aways!

You can read more about our Ingredients here: http://englishapothecary.bigcartel.com/ingredients

Directions: Rub a small amount over your skin and massage until absorbed. In colder months the salve may become hard. Leave on a warm stove or a sunny window to soften it up. This is perfect for your whole body and especially on very dry skin like the knees, elbows and feet!

Ingredients: Cocos Nucifera (Organic Coconut) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Beeswax, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Nut Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Citrus Aurantium (Neroli) Oil, Rosa Damascena (Organic Rose) Oil.

net. wt. 2.25 oz/61g.

name: Natural Lip Balm Tubes
description:
This smooth creamy lip balm feels like silk going onto your lips and gives hours of protection! Made with our Shea Butter and Mango Butter formula, perfect for treating dry cracked lips. This Lip Balm helps reduce degeneration of skin cells and restores skin elasticity while helping lock in moisture. 

Did you know that licking your lips dries them out? We make our balms without a sweetener to eliminate that temptation! :)

This lip balm is handmade and hand poured. You will get one tube or .15 oz worth of balm - that is months of daily use!

Choose from the following 6 flavors!

Blood Orange & Rose: Sweet like sugar candied flowers and Orange marmalade. 

Cardamom Vanilla: One of our best selling fragrances in Sugar Whipped Soap is now an all natural lip balm! This balm has a buttery vanilla flavor with a hint of warm spicy cardamom!

Chai Latte: Cinnamon, clove, ginger, black pepper, vanilla, cardamom. It is warm and cozy like cookies baking in the oven and a snuggle by the fire! 

Lavender Lime Fennel: Spicy and Floral Sweet a, with a splash of big bright sour lime. If you like the soap - you'll be sure to like the balm!

Pink Grapefruit Mint: Fresh squeezed Pink Grapefruit and a touch of Moroccan Mint!

Sweet Meyer Lemon: Perfect Sugared lemons!

Other good stuff:
- Cocoa Butter: penetrated the epidermis and dermis (top and middle layer of skin)
- Mango Butter: Is said to be protective against UV radiation and may help treat wrinkles
- Tocopherol (vitamin E): well read this article at How Stuff Works - it is good stuff!: http://health.howstuffworks.com/skin-care/information/nutrition/vitamin-e-benefit-skin.htm
- Jojoba Oil: Ok, actually a liquid wax similar to sebum produced by our own bodies so it helps to regulate excess sebum production. Lips don't actually produce sebum which is part of the reason our lips can dry out so Jojoba is the closest thing that we can treat our lips with!
- Black pepper: Warming, energizing
- Cinnamon Leaf: Stimulating, antibacterial

Ingredients: Theobroma Cacao (cocoa) Seed Butter, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera alba (Beeswax), Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Tocopherols (Vitamin E), Essential Oils.

name: French Lavender Artisan Soap
description:
Our French Lavender Soap is a classic lavender scent, calming and relaxing, to ease the mind and promote rest. 

Our Vegan Artisan Soaps are handcrafted with a skin loving blend of oils and butters including Fair Trade Organic Shea Butter, Sweet Almond Oil and Avocado Oil. Masterfully crafted to gently cleanse and soften your skin, and produce a fluffy luxurious lather!

Our all natural soap is fragranced with custom blended essential oils, absolutes and resins and the colors come from botanicals, herbal extracts and clays.  The color that nature gives us is truly amazing!

Hand cut and cured for 4 weeks

Each bar is 3.25 oz/ 92 g. 
It arrives in a Cotton Muslin bag made from cotton grown and sewn right here in the USA! The bag can be reused and filled with potpourri or used as a washcloth! Just remove the tag, wet and start washing! The tag style label includes all ingredients and is made from 100% recycled 50% post-consumer card stock and printed with water based eco-friendly ink.
Our Natural Soap retains all of the natural moisturizing glycerin often removed from mass produced soap. This can cause the soap to get soft if it is left in water. For maximum life span please allow this soap to dry out completely between uses.

Ingredients: Coconut Oil, Water, Palm Oil, Olive Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Castor Oil, Organic Shea Butter, Sweet Almond Oil, Avocado Oil, French Lavender Essential Oil, Pink Kaolin Clay, Lavender Flowers. 100% Natural Ingredients.

name: Blood Orange & Rose Whipped Shea Butter Scrub
description:
The benefits of daily exfoliation are widely known. When we exfoliate we help remove dead skin cells from the outermost layer of our skin,the epidermis, which the keeps skin clean, and helps reduce dry flaky skin. Exfoliation helps to expose newer skin cells and helps to unclog pores, allowing sebum to flow and keep skin moisturized. Exfoliation also increases blood flow to the surface of the skin so toxins can be more readily removed and exfoliation can help improve the tone, texture and evenness of skin color.

Our Blood Orange & Rose scrub smells like Sweet like candied flowers and marmalade. Very feminine and flowery! If you are a fan of our Blood & Roses soap you will love this! Made with Organic Shea Butter which contains beneficial fatty acids thought to promote cell regeneration and circulation. Wonderful for dry and aging skin! With Rose Geranium oil to help balance the skin!

This product emulsifies into a creamy scrub when applied to wet skin. It will leave your skin feeling soft and hydrated without feeling too oily!

7 oz/ 200g. in a cute bail jar. 98% natural. With Organic Ingredients! Paraben and Phalate Free!

NOTE: Do not use essential oils if pregnant or nursing.

Blood Orange & Rose Whipped Shea Butter Scrub Ingredients: Sucrose, Butyrospermum Parkii (Organic Shea Butter) Fruit, Helianthus Annuus (Organic Sunflower) Seed Oil,  Emulsifying Wax NF, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Peel, Montmorillonite, 2% Preservative: Phenoxyethanol (and) Caprylyl Glycol.

name: Throw Back Tin Slider Lip Balms
description:
Tin slider lip balms always remind me of vacation in some East Coast Beach town with little tourist shops and candy stores that sold vintage looking lip balms in tins, and old timey candy of course! I always thought they were so cool and "grown up" compared to the brightly colored kid lip balms I usually carried around. The tins made me feel so sophisticated and my friends would always ooh and ahh when I brought one out! And, having empty mini tins to store mini things in made me feel very organized (even though I never was and still am not!) I was a weird kid...

Our tin slider lip balms come in six Flavors and are lightly tinted with color. They do not contain a sweetener, also very adult, and they can be used not only on your lips but, to help keep fly-aways at bay, as cuticle butter (at least the ones without too much color), or maybe even an eyebrow tamer? I'll leave it up to you! ;)

Our lip balms contain a whole mess of good stuff including Mango butter and Olive Oil - two super moisturizers that also give the balm a smooth creamy texture! The wonderful blend of moisturizing oils and butters will leave your lips feeling happy! It is light and absorbs quickly in to your skin so no yucky greasy feeling!

Choose from:
Banana's Foster: Banana Liqueur and Vanilla Ice Cream with hints of Burnt sugar and Rum!
Brown Sugar: Brown sugar and butter flavor!
Coconut Lemongrass: Exotic and Fresh! Bright Lemongrass and iced Coconut milk!
French Vanilla: Creamy Buttery Vanilla (in Camus Blue)!
Lemon Sorbet: Sweet Sugared Meyer Lemons!
Toasted Coconut: Toasted Coconuts and a hint of buttercreme!

.25 oz/7g

Enjoy!

Ingredients: Theobroma Cacao (cocoa) Seed Butter, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera alba (Beeswax), Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Flavor. May contain color.

This does not contain a sweetener.

name: Lemon Gingergrass Whipped Shea Butter Scrub
description:
The benefits of daily exfoliation are widely known. When we exfoliate
we help remove dead skin cells from the outermost layer of our skin,
the epidermis, which the keeps skin clean, and helps reduce dry flaky skin. Exfoliation helps to expose newer skin cells and helps to unclog pores, allowing sebum to flow and keep skin moisturized. Exfoliation also increases blood flow to the surface of the skin so toxins can be more readily removed and exfoliation can help improve the tone, texture and evenness of skin color.

Our Lemon Gingergrass scrub smells like Lemon Ginger Frosting and is made with Organic Shea Butter. Shea Butter contains beneficial fatty acids thought to promote cell regeneration and circulation. Wonderful for dry and aging skin! The antioxidant in ginger, gingerol is a powerful antioxidant that fights skin damaging antioxidants and Ginger and Lemon are both used to promote an even skin tone. 

This product emulsifies into a creamy scrub when applied to wet skin. It will leave your skin feeling soft and hydrated without feeling too oily!

7 oz/ 200g. in a cute bail jar. 98% natural. Organic Ingredients! Paraben and Phalate Free!

NOTE: Do not use essential oils if pregnant or nursing.

Lemon Gingergrass Whipped Shea Butter Scrub Ingredients: Sucrose, Butyrospermum Parkii (Organic Shea Butter) Fruit, Helianthus Annuus (Organic Sunflower) Seed Oil,  Emulsifying Wax NF, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Oil , Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Oil, Cymbopogon Martini (Gingergrass) Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Powder, Calendula Officinalis Flower, 2% Preservative: Phenoxyethanol (and) Caprylyl Glycol.
